page.title: 08VILLAGE WALK I
page.content: Start outside the school and have a look at{Northend Cottage.}Then walk on down the High Street and look at{ {Linden House}and notice it has a very nice fan light over the door.Then cross over the road and go down Dixons Lane and look at the{pump}that people used in the old days.Then go to Paynes Lane and look at and look at all the interesting houses especially{Quorn {Cottage}because it has got some writing about the house.Then go up the rest of the High Street turn left down Rectory Lane and see the difference between the{Rectory}and the {Old Rectory.}Then come back up the High Street and look at the houses.Go and look at the{Close}and notice the {plaque}on the front of the house.Then go on down the High Street and look at the old{Methodist Church}which is now three cottages.
